onup.condition: [Container(20).HasFocus(1) + Skin.HasSetting(HideSubMenuMovies) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowWatchlistMovies)] | [Container(20).HasFocus(2) + Skin.HasSetting(HideSubMenuTVShows) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowWatchlistTVShows)] | [Container(20).HasFocus(4) + Skin.HasSetting(HideSubMenuMusic) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowWatchlistMusic)]
